publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2079 Pauline McNeill: Glasgow West Neighbourhood Watch—That the Parliament congratulates the Glasgow West Neighbourhood Watch on winning the National Neighbourhood Watch Group of the Year award.
S1M-2079 Glasgow West Neighbourhood Watch (lodged on 19 July 2001) Ms Sandra White*

S1M-2079 Pauline McNeill: Glasgow West Neighbourhood Watch—That the Parliament congratulates the Glasgow West Neighbourhood Watch on winning the National Neighbourhood Watch Group of the Year award. Supported by: Ms Sandra White, Irene Oldfather*
S1M-2079 Glasgow West Neighbourhood Watch (lodged on 19 July 2001) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2079 Glasgow West Neighbourhood Watch (lodged on 19 July 2001) Brian Fitzpatrick*

S1M-2079 Pauline McNeill: Glasgow West Neighbourhood Watch-That the Parliament congratulates the Glasgow West Neighbourhood Watch on winning the National Neighbourhood Watch Group of the Year award. Supported by: Ms Sandra White, Irene Oldfather, Tommy Sheridan, Brian Fitzpatrick
S1M-2079 Glasgow West Neighbourhood Watch (lodged on 19 July 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*

S1M-2079 Pauline McNeill: Glasgow West Neighbourhood Watch—That the Parliament congratulates the Glasgow West Neighbourhood Watch on winning the National Neighbourhood Watch Group of the Year award. Supported by: Ms Sandra White, Irene Oldfather, Tommy Sheridan, Brian Fitzpatrick, Mr Kenneth Gibson
S1M-2079 Glasgow West Neighbourhood Watch (lodged on 19 July 2001) Rhoda Grant*

S1M-2079 Pauline McNeill: Glasgow West Neighbourhood Watch-That the Parliament congratulates the Glasgow West Neighbourhood Watch on winning the National Neighbourhood Watch Group of the Year award. Supported by: Ms Sandra White, Irene Oldfather, Tommy Sheridan, Brian Fitzpatrick, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Rhoda Grant
S1M-2079 Glasgow West Neighbourhood Watch (lodged on 19 July 2001) Mr Jamie Stone*

S1M-2079 Pauline McNeill: Glasgow West Neighbourhood Watch-That the Parliament congratulates the Glasgow West Neighbourhood Watch on winning the National Neighbourhood Watch Group of the Year award. Supported by: Ms Sandra White, Irene Oldfather, Tommy Sheridan, Brian Fitzpatrick, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Rhoda Grant, Mr Jamie Stone
